storyInfo: Enis is about to embark on a journey far from home. Before that, he wants to create some unforgettable memories for his family.

attributes.content: It's already been two weeks since we said 'so long' to our volcano. My dear Siestans, do you already miss that spectacular eruption?
attributes.name: Radio Broadcast

attributes.content: I wonder, what was going through everyone's minds at that moment? After all, it was a once-in-a-lifetime occurrenceâ€”or at least I certainly hope so!
attributes.name: Radio Broadcast

attributes.content: 'Thank goodness I'm still alive!' 'That's it? It's over already?' ...Or maybe, 'Adios, Old Siesta!'
attributes.name: Radio Broadcast

attributes.content: To be honest, there was only one thing on MY mind at the time: What would it be like to reach out and grab a chunk of that volcanic cloud from the sky? Would it have tasted like a tomato, or a strawberry-flavored marshmallow?
attributes.name: Radio Broadcast

attributes.content: It's almost ready. Want to add anything? Strawberry jam or ketchup?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Give it to me with cotton candy!
attributes.name: Lut

attributes.content: That's not a thing, Captain Lut. Here you go.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I'm not the captain today, I'm the colonel.
attributes.name: Lut

attributes.content: Fine by me, Colonel Lut. Hopefully you like strawberry jam. Which would you like, Liv?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Liv?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: (Do you want some too?)
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: (But Enis only made so much. If you also have some, then there won't be enough for Harley!)
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: (How about this: I'll give you half of mine. Sound good?)
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: (Is Liv... having a conversation with thin air?)
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: (She's not sleeptalking, is she?)
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: (Sleepyhead.)
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: (Maybe I should just make it half-and-half.)
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Here you go, Liv. Half jam, half ketchup.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: That's no fair, Enis!
attributes.name: Lut

attributes.content: Fine, fine. Ketchup for Colonel Lut as well.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Now for a pop quizâ€”
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: If me and Harley aren't home, and you two have to cook for yourselves, what's the first thing you do after you're done?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Turn off the stoveâ€”
attributes.name: Lut

attributes.content: That one's too easy. You asked the same question the day before.
attributes.name: Lut

attributes.content: And your answer, Liv?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Hey, Livâ€” Don't start running off after only taking a single bite! Liv!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: ...Now why the heck would she just run off like that?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: (Liv's been acting strange all day... Could she be spacing out because she's upset that I'm leaving?)
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: (Maybe I need to sit down and have a talk with her. Might be worth taking her to a pet store before I go, see if I can find her a friend to keep her company.)
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Whoa! My fried egg...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Enis! Didn't I just say to turn off the stove after you finish cooking?
attributes.name: Lut

attributes.content: Ahaha... Y'know how it goes: do as I say, not as I do.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: *sigh*... One of you ran off without finishing her breakfast, and the other messed up his own breakfast.
attributes.name: Lut

attributes.content: But Colonel Lut here sat down at the table and ate his breakfast without a fuss. Don't I deserve a reward?
attributes.name: Lut

attributes.content: What would you like?
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: A D32 steel warrior.
attributes.name: Lut

attributes.content: Heh, well, I happen to have my own idea. How about I conveniently forget that you used my lip balm to scribble all over the drinks menu?
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: That wasn't me, Harley! H-How about we compromise? I'll just ask Enis to make me another omelet!
attributes.name: Lut

attributes.content: Good kids don't haggle. The more you try, the less you're getting out of me.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Hmph! Fine, then I'm leaving too!
attributes.name: Lut

attributes.content: Where are you going to play today, Lut?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Not telling!
attributes.name: Lut

attributes.content: Is this one mine?
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Yup. With pepper, as usual.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Just give me that overcooked mess you have sitting in the pan over there.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Hey, it's not that burnt... I can still eat it.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: (Reaches for cup)
attributes.name: Lut

attributes.content: Wait, Lut! That's... Don't drink that!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Lut

attributes.content: (Sniffs)
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Harley! How many times have I told you not to leave leftover drinks on the bar? The kids aren'tâ€”
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Yeah, yeah. A sip or two of orange ale's not gonna kill them; stop being such a worrywart. You've turned into more of a mom than me lately.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: People who can't take it easy before 'the Big Day' can't possibly become globetrotting explorers.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: That's a completely different issue...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Musicians before a performance don't have the time to worry about other people having their strings on right. Sort out your own affairs before worrying about us.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: You'll be leaving in a few days. Have you figured out the work situation yet?
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Three, two, one... Hup!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Hey hey hey, slow down... I've got this side secured. On my mark, liftâ€”
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: And liiiiftâ€”
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Phew... Alright, that should be the last box. The terminal shows there's still a batch of goods yet to be delivered to Siesta. Once everything arrives, would you mind moving it all to the warehouse and taking a detailed inventory?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Don't worry, it's an order from Mountaincomm Trade. As long as there's money to be made, you can count on me.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Oh, but a whole bunch of urgent shipments have been coming in recently. Without you to split the workload with, I might be out making nighttime deliveries...
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: So, Enis, are you absolutely positive about leaving Siesta?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Mmhmm. I've made up my mind.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Sure didn't see that coming... Guess that means the journey to revitalize Siesta's tourism industry is short another pair of capable hands.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: C'mere, gimme a hug. Have a safe journey.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: What's with all the touchy-feely stuff? It's not like I'm never coming back...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: You're an old friend I'm used to meeting every day. 'Course I don't want to see you go!
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Must be even harder for your family, though, seeing how tight you all are. We only just finished sorting out Fashion Street's grand renovation, and now they have to say goodbye again. It truly is just...
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Mm...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Harley actually didn't make much of a fuss over it. She was kind of a free spirit when she was younger, so I figure she wants me to go out there and take my shot.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: As for the siblings, it might take them some time to adjust.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: It's been on my mind the last few days, tooâ€”is there anything I can leave for them?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Hey, Enis, that kid walking down the road talking to herself... Is that your sister?
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: That she is... Strange.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Lemme go take a look.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: The towering crane stretches out its long arms, its hanging cable slowly cutting through the unbroken, pillowy clouds in the sky.
In the distance, Mount Siesta intermittently coughs up plumes of gray smoke. It's been wheezing like that ever since its tantrum two weeks ago.
The jam half of the omelet is yours.
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: Grandpa Tom didn't open the store today, so I wasn't able to get you any ice cream.
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: But the jam tastes really good, too. Enis made it himself. Enis...
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: ...Liv? Why'd she come out to the undeveloped plot again?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: She ran over here by herself when the volcano erupted... Could the tsunami back then have given her some sort of trauma? No, she'd be avoiding this place then...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: It's closer here, and I can almost hear her clearly. I hope she doesn't notice me...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Huh? She seems to have... some sort of furry creature with her? Is that what Liv was talking to this whole time?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: *nom* *nom*
attributes.name: Cheerful Creature

attributes.content: This is a little clay doll that Enis made for me. She has curly hair and a tiny flower tucked behind her ear. Do you think she looks like me? Enis said he made her with magic.
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: He's a liar. He doesn't know any magic. In the storybooks, magicians have all sorts of mystical, amazing powers, and they definitely never get sick.
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: (Grunts in dissatisfaction)
attributes.name: Cheerful Creature

attributes.content: Huh? Are you saying that even magicians can get sick?
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: Then, I'd rather Enis not be a magician.
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: I just wish he never got the stone disease.
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: (Grunts softly)
attributes.name: Cheerful Creature

attributes.content: The doctor lady said that it isn't that serious. But he ended up sleeping in the hospital for three whole days back then...
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: I heard from the adults on Fashion Street that people who get stone disease slowly turn to rock. Then they can't move or talk, and end up turning to sand and blowing away with the wind.
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: I... don't want that to happen to Enis.
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: (Nuzzles up close)
attributes.name: Cheerful Creature

attributes.content: Lately, he's been acting really strange. He seems so nervous. Do you think it's because of the 'Oripathy'?
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: Good thing he'll be leaving soon. To ship called Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: (Grunts in confusion)
attributes.name: Cheerful Creature

attributes.content: ...Of course not. Of course I don't want him to go.
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: But, Harley said there's lots and lots of amazing doctors on that ship, and I'm sure they'll find a cure for Enis's stone disease!
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: As long as he gets better, everything will be okay.
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: As for Fashion Street... You and Harley will be with me, right? Yeah, that's right. And that dummy Lut. We can all wait for Enis to come back, together.
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: (Nods)
attributes.name: Cheerful Creature

attributes.content: And here I was thinking she didn't want me to leave. But she's actually been worried about my condition this whole time.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Get it together, Enis. You can't go making your sister worry about youâ€”
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: (Turns head)
attributes.name: Cheerful Creature

attributes.content: Shootâ€”
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: The fuzzy thing... noticed me?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Speaking of which, I think I saw that exact same creature when the tsunami hit.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: So it wasn't just a dream after all... Are they the ones who protected me, Liv, and all of Siesta?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Liv also made a new friend.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: This is... a text message from Grandpa Tom?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Grandpa Tom!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Grandpa Tom?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Shh! Pipe down!
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: I'm up here, on the awning. Look up.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: What are you doing up there? You sent so many exclamation marks I thought this was urgent... You didn't open the shop today either, so I was fearing the worstâ€”
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Not my fault you've got an overactive imagination, brat! I've got plenty of life in me yet!
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: Now cut the crap and get up here already!
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: Huh? What for...?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: You'll know when you get up here, you stinkin' rascal!
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: Alright then...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: What's the big deal about this awning anyway? Surely you didn't invite me up here to catch some afternoon Siestan rays.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Look over thereâ€”
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: Hmm? Isn't that little boy...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Lut? What's he doing in front of the music shop?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Working. Been seeing him a lot lately. Seems like he's helping attract customers.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: Working? Him, of all people?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Now that I think about it though, I haven't seen him much lately. And he's been pretty tight-lipped whenever I asked him what he's been doing. I was wondering.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Is it because he doesn't have enough spending money? Don't tell me he's saving up for that D32 steel warrior...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Oi, oi. You're the older brother, aren't you? If you wanna treat them like your own kids, you'd best pay attention to how fast they grow!
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: How fast... they grow?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Uh-huh. The boy seems to have taken an interest in musical instruments. As expected of a kid who grew up on Fashion Street.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: The music shop's owner mentioned to me that he was asking about the price of a guitar, and said he wanted to learn.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: Seems like the guitar skills Harley keeps under wraps these days have finally been passed down.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: But he's too young for that... If he really wants one, he could've just asked me.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I'll talk to the shop owner.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Oi, you blockhead. Don't put a damper on his enthusiasm.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: You big brother types are always so stuck up. Wanting to do everything for your siblings, acting like they couldn't live without you.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: If you ask me, it's the other way around. You can't live without them!
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: But... that's how our relationship's always been.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: It's precisely because I'm leaving that I should do whatever I can for them. I can take care of something as simple as buying a guitar.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Even if you do, you gonna teach him to play too? And if you can manage that, why not learn for him too while you're at it? May as well make his musical dreams come true in his place!
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: Huh...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: If you put it that way... I suppose Liv has her new friend, and Lut has something he wants to do. Maybe they really don't need me as much as they did before.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: All of a sudden, it feels like... my heart's breakingâ€”
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: No matter how reluctant you are to let go of the kiddos, time waits for no one. Like it or not, they'll grow up sooner or later.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: They'll decide on a direction for their own lives, just like you're deciding to leave Siesta now.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: But I don't want to miss out on seeing them grow up either...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Look at the way Lut is introducing those products to tourists, all serious and stuff. Doesn't he remind you of someone?
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: Who?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Back on the beaches of Old Siesta, a certain young Enis selling bottled soda to tourists wherever he went.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: It's true that you might not be able to be with your siblings in the days to come. But during your time together, you've already left a subtle mark on how they think and act.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: As they grow up, the memories y'all made in the 'White Volcano' will accompany them in your place.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: Our memories... the 'White Volcano.'
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I think I get it now... So that's why Harley was so opposed to tearing it down before.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: That said, you were a way smarter kid than Lut.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: I mean, you'd secretly swap out all the condiments at the BBQ shack to spicy ones, and then stand around peddling your ice-cold sodas like you did nothing wrong.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: I can't believe you still remember that...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Who'd ever forget taking a bite of lava-hot BBQ?
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: I just wanted the store to sell out quick.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: That way we'd be able to get off work early, so Harley could get back to practicing her new songs with her old bandmates, and I'd be able to go swimming with Lut and Liv.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Speaking of which, those two had just joined the family at the time. Their tiny little hands couldn't even hold onto the floats, so I had to strap the floats to their backs so they could flop around in the shallow water while holding onto my arms.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: And in the blink of an eye, they're... Time sure flies, doesn't it?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: These are all... our family memories.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Thanks, Grandpa Tom! I'm gonna head over to the waterpark construction site real quick!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I finally figured out what I want to do before I leave!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Young folks sure have a lot of energy.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: I remember when you first came to Siesta. Just like Enis, you seemed like an endless bundle of energy.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: So, what'd you think of my choice of words?
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: The door handle of the cold drinks shop slowly turns, and the door begins to open.
A woman walks out of the shop and looks at the old shopkeeper leisurely basking in the sun on the awning.
Spoken like a sage.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: I'd expect nothing less from Tom, the man older than Fashion Street itself. What are some minor family troubles to him?
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Thanks to your notes, I didn't make a total fool of myself.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: But if you had everything all figured out, why not talk to Enis yourself? Why make an outsider like me give him that push on the back?
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: Good question.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Hahaha. You were actually in a pretty good mood when you said goodbye to Chuck. Drinkin' and singing just as always.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: But it's totally different when it's your son's turn to leave the nest. Dunno if it's because you're a mother or... maybe you should've swapped places with Chuck, who's out there livin' his best life.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: As if! My traveling days ended the moment I became a mom.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: I owe you a glass of something nice.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Then let me try your new creation, the 'Cotton Sunset.'
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: Mind a little chili powder?
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Wouldn't have it any other way.
attributes.name: Cold Drinks Shop Owner

attributes.content: *clink, clink*
*swish, swish*
Mm...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I think this is what the house number sign was like before. Hmm, the length doesn't seem quite right. Need to trim it a little bit over here.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: No good, the wood's too soft. I'll have to use stone after all.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Let me see... There's still some rocks I can use from the ones I brought over from the construction site.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: This piece looks decent enough. Alright, better finish up before they get back!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Can't wait to see the looks on their faces.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Huh... Why am I getting a nosebleed again?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Maybe it's because I'm brimming with energy and enthusiasm!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Enis!
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Huh? H-Harley? Why are you back so earlyâ€”
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Those rocks, the lumps of mud... You littleâ€” Are you secretly practicing your Arts again? Did the doctor's words go in one ear and out the other?
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Wait! I can explain!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: (Wipes nosebleed)
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Look. Chisel, hammer, saw.. I made these with my own two hands! No Arts involved!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: What's all this?
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Can't tell yet, right? All you need to do is raise this 'roof' up, andâ€”
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Tadah! Welcome back to the original 'White Volcano'!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: How does it look? What about this model over here? I made every little piece of this, bit by bit! Look at this signâ€”doesn't it look identical to the one that was on old Fashion Street?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Unfortunately my sculpting skills aren't quite up to par... The little refrigerator's handle is a bit crooked.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: So, this is the surprise you wanted to leave for us before you go?
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: It isn't something I made alone.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: It's not done yet. It's still missing a few of its most important parts. The rest needs to be finished together, as a family.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: This is for you.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: A clay doll? Is this supposed to be me? What's with the fro?
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: It was originally supposed to be braids, but I accidentally lopped 'em off so I figured I might as well change it to a fro... Besides, didn't you have that really puffy hairstyle when I was a kid? I always thought it was pretty neat.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I've seen worse.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: But the OG 'White Volcano' didn't look like that. The beach chairs and inflatable boats were only added after the expansion.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: More precisely, after Liv and Lut were born.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: But it was only then that 'White Volcano' became complete. These are supposed to be our memories.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: We're back!
attributes.name: Lut & Liv

attributes.content: Huh? What's that?
attributes.name: Lut

attributes.content: It's a mini 'White Volcano'!
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: I made a miniature of it. How's it look? Pretty sweet, right?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Standing in front of the door... Is that you and Harley?
attributes.name: Lut

attributes.content: They're tiny clay figures!
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: Mmhmm, that's right! Members of the adventure team, where are your dolls? Put 'em over here!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: And our two new little friends as wellâ€”
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Whoa... It's a fluffy little sheep doll!
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: Plus a D32 steel warrior!
attributes.name: Lut

attributes.content: No, no. This is Colonel Orirock!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: He followed us home, his stony heart moved after seeing how hard Colonel Lut was working at the music shop, even at his young age!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: (How'd Enis find out? Did you spill the beans?!)
attributes.name: Lut

attributes.content: (I... I swear it wasn't me! You must've let it slip 'cause you're so dumb!)
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: Ahem... Um, in any case! Colonel Orirock over here, just like me, is eagerly looking forward to Colonel Lut purchasing his first guitar and beginning his musical journey.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Lut, by the time I get back, you better have learned a few songs from Harley!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Hey. I never agreed to teach him.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Guitar?
attributes.name: Lut

attributes.content: ...What guitar?
attributes.name: Lut

attributes.content: Huh? Didn't you go to the instruments shop because you wanted to buy a guitar?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I guess Enis is even dumber than you are, Lut.
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: I think you should just tell him.
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: The young boy shrugs, takes a small wooden box from his little backpack, and places it in Enis's hands.
Upon it is a neat array of smooth metal sheets, its end tapering off in a beautiful arc, just like the waves bestowed upon the beach by the ocean.
On the box's surface is the 'White Volcano' logo, drawn with colored pens. Pasted next to it is a pink fluffy sheep, looking like it's about to eat it in one bite.
This is... a kalimba?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Are you giving it to me?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Mhm. This was the deal between me and the shop owner. Liv here drew the logo.
attributes.name: Lut

attributes.content: (Hugs)
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Urk...
attributes.name: Lut

attributes.content: Hey! Enis! Too tight!
attributes.name: Liv

attributes.content: Lut... Liv... Thank you so much.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Wonderful.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Looks like Lut and Liv know you well enough to understand that you're a musical dunce who can barely even play the kalimba.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: ...Harley, can we not kill the good vibes for now?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Alright, mission accomplished!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I guess we can put this miniature in front of the store, like a kind of mascot.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: After the waterpark is built, tourists will come by and ask, 'what's this little house?'
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: You should be more worried about drunkards puking all over it, instead of imagining people admiring your masterpiece.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Well, I trust you'll be able to prevent that!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: After all, this is the only way I'm gonna be here with you for a while: as this little doll living inside the model.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Hmph. Just stay well. That's the best gift you can get us.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Also, don't you think there's still something missing from it?
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: ...My goodness!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: I forgot to put Chuck in!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Enis! Rush delivery for you!
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: Thank heaven n' earth that the last one was made out to you. Otherwise I'd be out here griping how tedious this whole day's been.
attributes.name: Messenger

attributes.content: A rush delivery? I wonder who it's from...
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: The sender is... Ch-Chuck?!
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: With great anticipation, the youth opens the cardboard box sent from afar.
Wrapped up in layers of old newspapers is a little straw doll made from dried vines.
It looks a bit like Chuck, huh?
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Wait, his backpack... seems to be made from folded paper? There's something written inside.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: 'Son, I heard you were leaving 'White Volcano?''
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: 'Tell Harley I left a little 'golden happiness' in our family bank account.'
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: That's just like him.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: I hope he meant lodging money for Lut and Liv's next semester, and not a bill of debt.
attributes.name: Harley

attributes.content: 'The locals made this straw doll for me when I was in BolÃ­var. Does it look as buff as me?'
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: A sudden gust of wind blows by, and the straw man's limbs flop around like reeds.
Its hat of leaves also blows right off, revealing a bald head underneath.
'Have him see you off in my place!'
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: 'Being on the road isn't an easy thing. So, have you figured out where you're going? And how you're going to get there?'
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: 'I look forward to hearing your answer by the next time we get together.'
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: A few regulars lift the entryway's curtains, and the mother invites them to take a seat before the sound of ice cubes dancing in the shaker fills the room.
The laughter of his young siblings reaches his ears. For a moment, it's as if he is whisked away to the beach, back to the little store of his childhood.
The young man looks towards the end of Fashion Street, and before he knows it, the setting sun's afterglow has already composed the score for a perfectly ordinary night.
Finally, it's time to go.
attributes.name: Enis

attributes.content: Now then, what will the future have in store?
attributes.name: Enis
